Whilst noting it is the 50th anniversary of the Hungarian uprising against their Russian oppressors, one cannot help but feel for the naivity of the Hungarians.
 
 They are rioting because their premier lied to them in order to win an election.
 
 If that is the case why on earth aren't there riots in every country of the world ?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Hungarian Riots
